title: The 20 Most Anticipated Fall Movies and the Winners of the Telluride Film Festival
description:
Sean chats with Amanda about his trip to the Telluride Film Festival, an annual launchpad for Oscar contenders. He talks about the best films he saw and the scene in Colorado (0:30). Then they discuss what to look forward to for the rest of the movie year (44:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
